$UAN  The WindFall tax Headwind facing this industry is real.  The cheerleaders on this board dismiss the tax as with little chance of final passage.  Bernie ideas aren’t very marketable.
In the end that maybe true.  But Bernie is The Chairman of the Senate Budget Committee.  So the issue will be fully aired on the hill.  Committee on both side are chaired by Democrats.
Reports that the tax was last used in Korea are mistaken.   It was used in the 1970’s during the Arab oil embargo.  Two years.
Initial Bernie proposal 3 years total with 70% the first year and rising to 95%.   Those number are all negotiable I’m sure.
The Windfall profit tax 2022 debate continues.
